body.name: 5-in-1 Pack and Play, Baby Bassinet Bedside Sleeper with U-Shaped Diaper Changer, Portable Baby Playard for Newborn Toddlers, Baby Crib with 4 Adjustable Height, Carry Bag, Easy to Install
features: 【5-IN-1 Pack and Play】---Afgbf 5 in 1 pack and play can be converted into a variety of modes to meet the different needs of the baby in the growing process: baby bedside sleeper, baby rock cradle, activity center, and baby crib

【Convenience and Safety】---The storage tray can be installed on any armrest to store diapers, baby bottles, tissues and other necessities; It is worth mentioning that the armrest is designed with two straps to help you organize the cloth of the armrest and fix it. The attached safety strap can be connected to your bed for increasing stability

【Premium Material】---Made of sturdy iron tubes, this baby crib is stable enough for babies from 0-36 months old. The odorless Oxford cloth provides long-lasting service time and safe environment to rest. The mesh cloth not only features excellent air permeability, but also facilitates parents to observe the state of the child

【Easy to Install & Carry】---Light structure for easy take in the journey, we send the travel bag coming with the package. You can set up and fold by only 4 simple steps. Please Make Sure lock the fence before push down the bottom base to keep sturdy
【Designed for Baby's Safety】Afgbf Baby Playard performs more safety tests and quality checks than other brands and meets or exceeds all safety standards set by the CPSC &ASTM

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Baby Bedside Sleeper In Bedside Crib mode, the height of the guardrail is adjustable(the height of baby sleeping is fixed), the side can be adjusted to 4 heights to adapt to different adult beds or sofas, also suitable for other places to use, making it easier for you to reach out and take care of your baby. Side fixing straps must be set when using the bedside bed model to prevent bed tilting and baby falling

Easy to attach or remove from parents’ bed using the fastening strap provided The wheels are equipped with a braking system, which can perform well whether it is moving or keeping it in place. Place the bassinet bed right up against to your bed and lock the wheels, then you can easily take care of or feed your baby. The attached safety strap can be connected to your bed for increasing stability
Please read the product manual and follow the instructions for assembly

How to fold? Firstly pull up the drawstring of the bottom,secondly pull down the four sides of the playpenHow to assemble? Firstly pull up four sides,secondly press down the bottom of the playpenIf one side can't be locked, please re-fold the playpen first, then try again to assemble the playpen correctly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Marvel for New Parents
reviews.reviewText: As first-time parents, we embarked on the quest for the perfect baby gear with a mix of excitement and apprehension. The Baby Bassinet, Pack and Play, 5-in-1 Baby Bedside Sleeper exceeded our expectations in every possible way.One of the standout features is its adaptability. With 4 adjustable height settings, it seamlessly accommodates various bed heights, ensuring that our little one is always within arm's reach. This proved invaluable during those early weeks of night feeds and diaper changes. The convenience and peace of mind this brings are immeasurable.Portability is another strong suit. The ability to transform it into a compact, easily transportable package is a godsend for families on the move. Whether visiting grandparents or going on a weekend getaway, this playard transitions effortlessly from home to car to destination. The included carry bag is a thoughtful touch, adding an extra layer of convenience.Setting up the playard was a breeze, even for two sleep-deprived parents. The instructions were clear and concise, and all the components fit together seamlessly. It's evident that the designers considered the practicality of installation, which is a welcome relief for those navigating the challenges of early parenthood.One of the most delightful surprises was the ample storage space. The attached storage compartments provide a dedicated spot for essentials like diapers, wipes, and extra onesies. This ingenious design eliminates the need for a separate diaper bag, streamlining outings and minimizing the number of items to carry.Safety is, of course, a paramount concern for any parent. The sturdy construction of this playard offers peace of mind. It's evident that the materials used are of high quality, ensuring a secure environment for our little one. The bassinet and playard both feel stable and robust, instilling confidence in their longevity and durability.Versatility is where this product truly shines. It seamlessly transitions from a bedside sleeper for those early months to a playpen as our baby grows. This adaptability ensures that the investment lasts well beyond the newborn stage. It's a piece of baby gear that grows with our child, making it a practical and cost-effective choice.In terms of design, the playard is both aesthetically pleasing and highly functional. The neutral color scheme blends effortlessly with our home decor, and the clean lines exude a modern sensibility. It's a piece of baby gear that complements our living space rather than overpowering it.To summarize, the 5-in-1 Baby Bassinet, Pack and Play exceeded our expectations on every front. Its adaptability, portability, ease of installation, safety features, storage capacity, and versatile design make it an indispensable addition to our parenting toolkit. It has simplified our lives and provided a safe, comfortable space for our little one to grow and explore. We wholeheartedly recommend it to fellow parents embarking on this incredible journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and price
reviews.reviewText: The baby bassinet exceeded expectations with its sturdy build and thoughtful design. Love the adjustment height, making it easy to keep the baby close at night. The mesh sides provide excellent ventilation, and the storage pockets are convenient for keeping essentials nearby. Assembling the bassinet was a breeze, and the overall quality assures a safe and comfortable space for the baby to sleep Highly recommend for new parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and has all the functionalities we need!
reviews.reviewText: This comes in a compact box which doesn’t take too much space for storage. The placard is easy to assemble and the extensions have most of the functionalities we need. The fabric quality is good and bassinet sturdy enough for a baby. In terms of portability, the assembled playard is too wide to go through my bedroom door to be moved to the living room. Overall very good value for money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy baby crib and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Seeing this baby crib was on sale and interested in the different functions of it. This baby crib was easy to install and soft. The heights are adjustable so we can place it by the side of our bed with the same heights as our bed. There are spots where we can store diapers and bottles. Also, the small toys at the topside are good for baby sleeping. This baby crib can be converted to a toddler playyard and is very comfy and durable so it can be used for a while until baby is big enough to switch to a normal child bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfectly match our needs!
reviews.reviewText: The 5-in-1 Pack and Play exceeded expectations with its versatile design. The bedside sleeper, U-shaped diaper changer, and portable playard make it a parent's dream. Adjustable height accommodates growth, and easy installation adds to its appeal. Sturdy and durable, it's a must-have for on-the-go families seeking convenience and safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s very easy to assemble. Its portability is an advantage for our family on the move. Despite its size, it designed with safety and functionality, offering adjustable mattress heights and sturdy construction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for newborns
reviews.reviewText: This pack and play is perfect for newborns. You can use it as a pack and play, a changing table, a bassinet, and a bedside sleeper. It is easy to assemble, and it folds up easily for travel. This would make a great baby shower gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have for New Parents!
reviews.reviewText: The Afgbf 5-in-1 Pack and Play has made parenting a breeze for us. The U-Shaped Diaper Changer is a game-changer for late-night changes, and the 4 Adjustable Heights of the Baby Crib provide ultimate convenience. Easy installation, portability with a Carry Bag, and a compact fold make it a must-have for any new parent. Sturdy, versatile, and thoughtfully designed – highly recommended!

I ordered this particular item as it had a drop down side to four different heights of exposure. I am not certain why there was a very solid stitch across the zipper on both sides. Good thing I managed to finally cut the thread without damaging the product or the zipper. That is not a good idea to stitch across the middle of a zipper and I am not certain why?
Very poor quality of material used
